note.p: Born in Wolverhampton, Staffordshire. Daughter of Stephenson Hunter, Unitarian minister in Wolverhampton and professor of Hebrew and mathematics at the Presbyterian College, Carmarthen. Married John Gwenogfryn/Gwenogvryn Evans, Unitarian minister and Welsh scholar, in Preston, Lancashire, 1877. In Oxford, St Giles, 1881. In Llanbedrog, Caernarvonshire, 1911.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2018/421/37), 1861 (RG9/4139/17/29), 1881 (RG11/1500/11/15), 1911 (RG14/34380/116)
Y bywgraffiadur Cymreig; Dictionary of Welsh biography s.v. Evans, John Gwenogvryn (https://biography.wales, accessed 1 March 2021)
